channel.title: Grimon1 on Claire Radel Fans
channel.description: Recent content in Grimon1 on Claire Radel Fans

item.title: an educational attempt with unexpected consequences
item.description: It was in the first month after I moved with mom and dad to Hamburg, that my Cousin and her girlfriend came to visit us there.

item.title: Seduced by Jils glasses
item.description: When I was 10 years old my mom who was often beaten and treated bad by my dad decided to make an end to the violence she had to suffer and stabbed my dad.

item.title: gardening part 2 (took long, but here it's finally...)
item.description: Helen hadn’t said a word about the fact that I constantly wear glasses now, but now as we sat in her living-room opposite of a big mirror that reflected our faces, she smiled at me and said” I just cant recall how your face looks without glasses, I feel almost as if these glasses have always been a part of you.

item.title: A hidden wish, the complete story
item.description: When I was a young boy of 7 years I spent some weeks staying at my aunt Claire mums younger sister because mum was ill and in hospital for some time.

item.title: A hidden wish comes true, Part1
item.description: When I was a young boy of 7 years I spent some weeks staying at my aunt Claire mums younger sister because mum was ill and in hospital for some time.

item.title: sailing
item.description: I, Francis, was a 13 years old girl while the first waves of puberty shook my and my parents life.

item.title: Lies are Dangerous
item.description: I was almost 14 years old, when I sat on a train travelling from Norway where I live with my Dad to Southweden, where my Mom lives.

item.title: The domino effect
item.description: I am a close friend to Astrid since a couple of months, we got to know each other through our jobs and managed a few projects together.
